column5: Ajax Animal Hospital wrote:  We are sorry to report that there have been three cases, in the last 24 hours, of dogs who have been treated for getting into raw meat that has been left out around St. James School in Ajax. At this point, we are unsure if the meat has been tampered with or poisoned, the treated dogs are doing well. Please take care in this area!
That's just terrible  I know what I'd do to the person if I ever caught them
I can think of one suspect
surely they can't have been targeting dogs...if so, there's a special place in hell for them.
Yes they are targeting dogs,,,a few weeks ago in Oshawa there were several dogs poisoned in an off leash dog park....Take extra care to what your dog gets into,,,

Sounds like what happened in Withrow Park in Toronto a few years ago.  A local who didn't like dogs in the park did similar. Think it was meat as well, not sure. A few dogs died I think, one was a King Charles that belonged to a high profile banker.
It takes all kinds doesn't it?
was he un-noticed or feeding them in plane view of all to see?

Sadly. it happens all the time. I've known numerous incidents where dogs have been poisoned with antifreeze or warfin. I've even found the baited meat and dishes of antifreeze left out in the park. Enforcement came up empty handed.
